summary: A new Kick Animation for hand to hand power attacks.
descriptionHtml:
A new Kick Animation for Hand to Hand combat power attacks.

This is a very light weight mod as it only changes 1 animation h2hpowerattackright.hkx

Extract the file.
............../Steam/SteamAPPS/Common/Skyrim/Data 
Paste the file here

[img]http://media.giphy.com/media/12ctlXGzRgIexa/giphy.gif[/img]
Please Read

For those of you using a lot of animations hopefully you are using FNIS to load the animations properly.
Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS by [b]fore [url]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?[/url][/b]

Now go in game and start punting. 
For those of you out there that would like to just kick things.
A unrulely dog not listening that's fine kick it in the face. 
Kids will use the kick against each other when fighting. 
NPC's and folowers will use the animation as well if they are unarmed.

Tools Used 
Creation Kit 

Credits 
Kryptonian 
Evanoblivion for making the animation Sparta Kick
Fore for making FNIS

[img]http://giphy.com/gifs/skyrim-tes-9ACB7SiExAcmc[/img]
Remember to Endorse if you love the mod
author: Krypt and EvanOblivion
